prompt: <description>Part 1 Instructions Create Coordinate System Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler angles to (0.0, 0.0, -90.0) and the translation vector to (0.0, 0.1725, 0.0). Generate 2D Sketch Create a new 2D sketch on the plane defined by the coordinate system. Create Circle Create a circle on the sketch with its center at (0.375, 0.375) and a radius of 0.375. This circle forms a single loop and covers the entire sketching plane. Scale Sketch Scale the sketch with a factor of 0.75. Transform 2D Sketch into 3D Sketch Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch, by applying the rotation angles from the coordinate system. Extrude Sketch Extrude the sketch along its normal direction by 0.1725 units, which forms the first part. Part 2 Instructions Create Coordinate System Create a new coordinate system for the second part. Set the Euler angles to (0.0, 0.0, -90.0) and the translation vector to (0.0733, 0.1725, 0.0733). Generate 2D Sketch Create a new 2D sketch on the plane defined by the new coordinate system. Create Circle Create a circle on the sketch with its center at (0.3017, 0.3017) and a radius of 0.3017. This circle forms a single loop and covers the entire sketching plane. Scale Sketch Scale the sketch with a factor of 0.6035. Transform 2D Sketch into 3D Sketch Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch, by applying the rotation angles from the new coordinate system. Extrude Sketch Extrude the sketch along its normal direction by 0.1725 units.
